entry.def: A uniform is a special set of clothes which some people, for example soldiers or the police, wear to work in and which some children wear at school.

example.ex: The town police wear dark blue uniforms and flat caps...
example.tran: 镇上的警察穿着深蓝色制服，戴着鸭舌帽。

example.ex: Philippe was in uniform, wearing a pistol holster on his belt...
example.tran: 菲利普身着制服，腰带上别着手枪皮套。

entry.def: You can refer to the particular style of clothing which a group of people wear to show they belong to a group or a movement as their uniform.

example.ex: Mark's is the uniform of the young male traveller — green Army trousers, T-shirt and shirt.
example.tran: 马克一身年轻男性旅行者的典型行头——绿军裤、T恤外加衬衫。

entry.tran: （同一物）始终如一的，均匀的，划一的
entry.def: If something is uniform, it does not vary, but is even and regular throughout.

example.ex: Chips should be cut into uniform size and thickness...
example.tran: 土豆条要切得大小厚薄均匀。

example.ex: All flowing water, though it appears to be uniform, is actually divided into extensive inner surfaces, or layers, moving against one another...
example.tran: 所有流动的水看似一成不变，但实际上内部分成许多广延的面，或者说层，彼此逆向移动。

entry.tran: （不同物）全都相同的，一律的，清一色的
entry.def: If you describe a number of things as uniform, you mean that they are all the same.

example.ex: Along each wall stretched uniform green metal filing cabinets...
example.tran: 每面墙边都一溜摆着相同的绿色金属档案柜。

example.ex: Shrimp are raised in long uniform ponds, frozen in the nearby packing plant and shipped north.
example.tran: 虾放养在清一色的长池子里，再送到附近的包装车间冷冻，最后用船运往北方。

auth_sentence.content: But Tuesday's economic data was not uniformly rosy.
auth_sentence.res_content: But Tuesday's economic data was not uniformly rosy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But Tuesday's economic data was not uniformly rosy.

auth_sentence.content: These ETFs spread risk widely, though not uniformly.
auth_sentence.res_content: These ETFs spread risk widely, though not uniformly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These ETFs spread risk widely, though not uniformly.

auth_sentence.content: They almost uniformly described an idyllic university life.
auth_sentence.res_content: They almost uniformly described an idyllic university life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They almost uniformly described an idyllic university life.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,表示"……的",通常在在名词后.; 2. 表副词,放在形容词后,"……地"

stems_affixes.word_buile: come来+ly……的→翩翩而来→美丽动人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cost代价+ly……的→adj.昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
drizz毛毛雨+ly……的→adj.毛毛雨的[a drizzly day]
friend朋友+ly……的→adj.友好的,友谊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,合适的,可靠的
stems_affixes.word_buile: like像+ly……的→adj.很可能的,合适的,可靠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: live活+ly……的→adj.活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
man男人+ly……的→adj.男子气概的,果断的
niggard小气鬼+ly……的→adj.吝啬的,勉强的
otherworld超世+ly……的→adj.超脱尘世的,超俗的
spindle细长的人[或物]+ly……的→spindly细长的,纤弱的
time时间+ly……的→adj.及时的,适时的
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
continuous连续的+ly……的→adv.不断地,连续地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 幸福地,愉快地,恰当地,幸亏
stems_affixes.word_buile: happy快乐的,幸福的+ly……的→happily幸福地
active积极的+ly……地→adv.活跃地,积极地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
according相符的+ly……地→adv.因此,从而
final最后的+ly……地→adv.最后,终于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
stems_affixes.word_buile: actual[adj.实际的, 真实的, 现行的, 目前的]+ly……地→adv.实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
adequate足够的+ly……地→adv.充分地
consequent作为结果的+ly……地→adv.从而,因此
anxious担忧的+ly……地→adv.忧虑地,不安地
biological[adj.生物学的]+ly……地→adv.生物学上
certain肯定的+ly……地→adv.的确,[口语]当然,行
chief主要的+ly……地→adv.首要,主要地
commercial商业的+ly……地→adv.商业上,通商上

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
stems_affixes.word_buile: current当前的,流动的+ly……地→adv.普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
decided确定的+ly……地→adv.果断地,断然地
definite明确的+ly……地→adv.一定地,明确地
easy容易的+ly……地→easily容易地

exceeding非常的+ly……地→adv.极端地,非常
excessive过分的+ly……地→adv.过分地,非常地
extreme极端的+ly……地→adv.极端地,极其,非常
aggressive侵略的+ly……地→adv. 侵略地,攻势地

sentences.en: The once-green fields were now uniformly brown.
sentences.cn: 曾经的绿地现在变成了一片褐色。

sentences.en: The performances and recordings are uniformly excellent.
